recipes.name: Recipe with invalid name field: S@ndw!ch
recipes.instructions: Make egg salad by chopping the hard boiled eggs and mixing in a bowl with mayonnaise, Dijon. Halve the rolls and spread one half with Dijon, the other half with mayonnaise. Sprinkle the mayonnaise-spread half with salt and pepper. Lay cheese and ham on the mustard half; lay avocado, onion slices, tomato slices, egg salad, and lettuce on the other half.
